Bash("A:/Anaconda/envs/My-Chat-LangChain/python.exe" -c "
import urllib.request
import json

no_proxy_handler = urllib.request.ProxyHandler({})
opener = urllib.request.build_opener(no_proxy_handler)

# 测试主题列表 API
try:
    req = urllib.request.Request(''http://127.0.0.1:8005/api/v1/editor/themes'')
    response = opener.open(req, timeout=10)
    data = json.loads(response.read().decode())
    print(f''Themes API - Status: {response.status}'')
    print(f''Total themes: {data[""total""]}'')
    print(f''Theme types: {[t[""type""] for t in data[""themes""][:5]]}...'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''Themes API Error: {e}'')
")
